location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 19 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter encloses a firman [not transcibed] from the Prince of Shiraz requesting the assistance of the Government of Bombay for Hajee Abdool Kurreem, who wished to recover property belonging to his deceased brother at Hydrabad [Hyderabad].
